trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> 동작과 <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> 를 대화형으로 중지 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).

Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: 스토리 보드 트리거 중지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> 이벤트 하지 않고는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> 이벤트입니다.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> 참조 하지 않는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 직접 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 대신, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> 참조 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> 제어 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>합니다.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) 예에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지, 다시 시작, 중지 또는 그렇지 않은 경우 스토리 보드를 대화형으로 제어

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지할 수를 다시 시작 하거나 다른 방식으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> 대화형으로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 속성의 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> 개체 (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 하 여 제어할 수 참조 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> 지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> 으로 시작한 후에 대화형으로 제어할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) 자세한 정보에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard" /> class.
